title: Sora no Aosa wo Shiru Hito yo (Her Blue Sky)
synopsis: High school student Aoi Aioi lives with her elder sister, Akane, after a tragic accident took their parents away 13 years ago. Because Akane has since been taking care of her single-handedly, Aoi wants to move to Tokyo after her graduation to relieve her sister's burden and pursue a musical career, inspired by Akane's ex-boyfriend Shinnosuke "Shinno" Kanamuro. Shinno was part of a band until he left for Tokyo to become a professional guitarist after the sisters' parents passed away, and he was never to be seen again.
related_anime: ['Sora no Aosa o Shiru Hito yo Memories of Anohana & Kokosake TV Special Program', 'Ano Hi Mita Hana no Namae wo Bokutachi wa Mada Shiranai.', 'Sora no Aosa wo Shiru Hito yo']
